game.name: Bad Rats Show
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 통계, Steam 순위표, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bad Rats Show is a physics puzzle game where the rats exact their bloody revenge against their main enemies: the Cats. Solve puzzles in 2D and 3D maps using physics, objects and specially trained Rats. All new Rats and Cats, but with the same classic and questionable Bad Rats humor.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bad Rats Show is a physics puzzle game where the rats exact their bloody revenge against their main enemies: the Cats. Solve puzzles in 2D and 3D maps using physics, objects and specially trained Rats. All new Rats and Cats, but with the same classic and questionable Bad Rats humor.
